QuestData.Title: An Expected Guest
QuestData.Description:
While we await word from Huln, another matter of importance has arisen.
Bwonsamdi has returned to Ardenweald. Lord Herne believes he is here to request an audience with the Winter Queen.
The loa of death, however, pursues a different purpose. One that I have glimpsed in my dreams.
Meet with Bwonsamdi. Discover what fate has in store for the both of you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Bwonsamdi in the Heart of the Forest within Ardenweald.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Bwonsamdi in the Heart of the Forest within Ardenweald.
QuestData.RewardText: Ol' Bwonsamdi knew ya gonna come see me. I got someting ya wanna hear...
